website_summaries.verdict: This inexpensive model can pack decent power, but is not as good at mulching as some others.
pros: All the basics of a good system at a lower price than some
Also can serve as a blower
Comes with a wider vacuum attachment
Changing from vacuum to blower is simple
cons: Not as much air speed as comparable models
Vacuum has a tendency to clog

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is really an efficient tool that can quickly dispose of the messy leaves in my yard. Whenever I saw the leaves in the yard, I really hope that I can have a good tool to handle them for me. Now I am glad that I bought this leaf blower with light weight, bag well constructed and easy to empty,all my leaves are picked up!It really is a good product worth recommending.
customer_reviews.author: rijin lu

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Happy with it. Does what it's supposed to. Packages well. Seems well consructed. Powerful on high. Moves the leaves and vacuums well off of lawn or street (DON'T use the vacuum on gravel or sand). Pleased so far. I recommend
customer_reviews.author: RV guy

customer_reviews.title: Want to return ASAP
customer_reviews.text: Bulky, heavy, awkward strap harness and too much dust escapes while using vacuum. They sent mea different model then what I ordered because unavailable. Hate this thing
customer_reviews.author: jack

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very good in all aspects. Minor exception: the vacuum gets clogged a little too easy.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Ferpozzi

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Wish it was a tiny bit more powerful, but it works well.
customer_reviews.author: DaynaB

customer_reviews.title: Its loud, but good. Where a mask, it gets dusty.
customer_reviews.text: The bag broke after the 3rd use, that's disappointing! Bow to try to order another bag
customer_reviews.author: Christina Kerrigan

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: When vacuuming the leaves there is dust coming out from the bag
customer_reviews.author: phuong tran

customer_reviews.title: Good equipment
customer_reviews.text: Good product good price I recommend this to homeowner people
customer_reviews.author: jorge

customer_reviews.title: Clogs up for no reason
customer_reviews.text: Contrary to the other people who loved this item I don’t. I raked a small pile of leaves up and tried to use this to pick them up. Item picked up leaves and stopped picking them up. I cleared the intake area and tied again. Same thing happened. I tried again after checking to make sure the blade was spinning. Same thing. Cleared again making sure I only picked up a few leaves at a time. Jammed again. Finally I realized o could have manually bagged these much faster and gave up. Not sure why I fall for these things.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Mc

customer_reviews.title: Heavy unit
customer_reviews.text: Does no work for what I wanted. We get bird seed on our deck from our feeder. I wanted it to suck up the seeds. Too heavy and for other uses.hard to reach so areas. May work well
customer_reviews.author: bruce L. Streeter

customer_reviews.title: great product,like it😍
customer_reviews.text: At the door of my home, this hair dryer is just suitable for wearing 3 heads, which can be blown and sucked. It is very practical and convenient
customer_reviews.author: kings

product_meta.title: Best Partner Leaf Blower Vacuum Mulcher with 2 Speed Control, 200 MPH Air Speed 12 AMP Motor and Collection Bag Lncluded
product_meta.description: BEST PARTNER：The best friend in your daily-life. Are you looking for a multi-function leaf blower? Are you often troubled by the leaves in the yard? Do you want your garden to be clean and beautiful? CHOOSE BEST PARTNER LEAF BLOWER TO SOLVE YOUR CONCERNS WHY CHOOSE BEST PARTNER ❤This electric blower is very because it does not use gas or oil, nor does it produce smoke. ❤It has tool-free switching between vacuum and blower in seconds and an easy-empty bag design that saves time and effort. ❤Two speed for different demands for different functions. Plus added Leaf shredding performance. All makes it an indispensable tool for every home. ❤The B&P leaf blower vacuum lets you create a professional-looking yard with less work, less fatigue and in less time. The 200-mph airspeed is not only efficient but also less noisy. Specification: Model: GBF1200 Product name: Leaf blower&vacuum Rated current: 12-Amp Idle speed: 11000/14000 RPM Max air speed: 200 MPH Max air flow: 450CFM In addition If you have any questions, we will reply you within 24 hours, you do not need to worry about after-sales problems, so what are you waiting for, buy it as soon as possible.
feature_bullets: 【MULTI-FUNCTION】:3-in-1 design, blower, vacuum and mulcher for fast leaf cleanup.
【EASY TO OPERATE】When you vacuum please make the tube very close to the leaves and adjust the speed to level 2 to achieve more power.
【HIGH POWER】：Powerful 12-Amp motor generates up to 200 Mph of air flow.Achieve high efficiency and high power.
【SIMPLE DESIGN】:The design is simple, easy to assemble and install, bring convenience to users, improve the efficiency of use.
【CONVENIENT and PRACTICAL】:Easy change between vacuum and blower. lncludes Blow Tube, Vacuum Tube and reusable collection bag .
